attributes.action: Ease the burden on council tax payers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Instead of levying a windfall tax in the private utility companies profits. 

They should be made to re-instate public Roads,Footpaths Verges ETC. to the condition they were in before the carried out any works and not left like patchwork quilts and ploughed fields. 

After all we as local the tax payers have already payed for these amenities to be kept in good order from our council taxes and road taxes ETC.

The private utility shareholders should carry the burden and not the local tax payers again.
